'''v0.10.3 alpha''' is a minor update to ''[[Pocket Edition|Minecraft: Pocket Edition]]'' released on November 21, 2014 for Android only, to fix some bugs in [[Pocket Edition v0.10.2 alpha|v0.10.2]].

== Fixes ==
*Fixed some bugs and crashes.</onlyinclude>
